ARABIC: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسْقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٍ صَدِيدٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And beyond him is Hell where he will be given pus to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Before him is Hell, and he will get putrid liquid to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Hell is before him and he shall be made to drink of the oozing pus,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thereafter they will face hell fire wherein they will drink boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Hell went after him, and he will be made to drink liquid pus*. (* Discharged from the wounds of other people in hell.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In front of him is Hell, and he will be made to drink boiling, festering water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Hell is before him and he shall be given to drink of festering water:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: beyond him Gehenna, and he is given to drink of oozing pus,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hell is before him, and he is made to drink a festering water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Beyond him is Hell, and he shall drink putrid water;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Behind him is Hell, and he shall be made to drink of fetid water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: with hell lying ahead of him, [where] he shall be given to drink of a purulent fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In front of such a one is Hell, and he is given, for drink, boiling fetid water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In front of him (every obstinate, arrogant dictator) is Hell, and he will be made to drink boiling, festering water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Gehenna (Hell) is before him and he is given oozing pus to drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Beyond him lies Hell, and he will be given to drink putrid water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:16] beyond him, that is, in front of him, is Hell, which he will enter, and he is given to drink, in it, of festering   fluid — which is what issues out of the insides of the people of the Fire, mixed with pus and blood —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hell is before him) Hell is before this arrogant person when he dies, (and he is made to drink a festering water) and he is made to drink what comes of his skin of puss and blood.
